long_description: Use the Joby GorillaPod Action Tripod to secure your action camera, such as a GoPro(R) (sold separately), to a branch, rock, street sign or other surface to catch all the action from any angle. Flexible legs allow you to connect your action video camera to nearly any surface. Quickly orient your action camera and capture exciting footage with 90deg tilting and 350deg panning capabilities in landscape or portrait setups. Custom-made, quick-release mount stays connected to your GoPro(R) camera for quick setups. Joby GorillaPod Action Tripod accepts cameras with universal 1/4-20 tripod sockets and GoPro cameras.
short_description: Use the Joby GorillaPod Action Tripod to secure your action camera, such as a GoPro(R) (sold separately), to a branch, rock, street sign or other surface to catch all the action from any angle.
